dc:title: Help Needed This Summer For Puerto Rican Camp
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Appeals to readers for money to assist children from East Harlem to spend a summer at the beach.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 688 1955-06-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
